name: ORANGE HELICOPTERS PTY LTD
about: Orange Helicopters Pty Ltd is a local, family-run business dedicated to providing exceptional helicopter services. Our Helischool, equipped with state-of-the-art equipment and led by seasoned instructors, offers an unparalleled learning experience for aspiring pilots. We specialize in helicopter pilot training, ensuring a comprehensive and safe education. Additionally, we offer exhilarating tourist adventures and reliable aerial services, making us a trusted name in the region. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Orange Helicopters is your ideal choice for all helicopter needs.
services:
["Orange Helicopters Flight Training

Low Level Flight Training
Formation Flight Training
Winch/Sling/Rappel Approvals"]
